original_text: You husbands must also respect your wives. Be kind to your wife and help her. Remember that she is not as strong as you are. Because God is very kind, she has received his gift of true life, as you have. So you should respect her. Then God will answer you when you pray to him.
korean_text: 남편들아 이와 같이 지식을 따라 너희 아내와 동거하고 그를 더 연약한 그릇이요 또 생명의 은혜를 함께 이어받을 자로 알아 귀히 여기라 이는 너희 기도가 막히지 아니하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: You husbands must also respect your wives.
Remember that she is not as strong as you are.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 당신만큼 강하지 않다는 것을 기억하세요.

sentences.original_text: she has received his gift of true life,
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 하나님의 참된 생명의 선물을 받았습니다,
